title: Are you a great product manager?
description: A light-hearted quiz based on a Twitter thread by Peter Yang. Wrong answers only

title: Good & bad questions to ask in user interviews
description: It's essential to talk to your users, but how you do it matters just as much

title: Life of a PM at Razorpay
description: Razorpay has launched a great many successful products in the recent few years. Lets try to see how their product team did that.
